headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Invesco (IVZ) RBC Upgrade And Business Mix Shift
summary: In recent days, RBC Capital Markets upgraded Invesco to an Outperform rating, citing an improved outlook for organic growth, potential margin expansion in 2026–2027, and earnings benefits linked to the QQQ ETF reclassification. At the same time, Invesco has been reshaping its business mix, including a partnership under which CI Global Asset Management assumes management of its Canadian fund lineup while retaining Invesco’s investment input. We’ll examine how RBC’s focus on potential margin...
